reviews.review:
Lets see what uncle GabeN is offering to us...
First thing which is conspicuous is a beautiful, canny gameplay. Though the fact that this game was created 11 years ago, it doesnt really matter. Portal 2 does not require good pc specs - im having over 200 fps with max out graphics. Bunnyhopping is kinda easy in this game and it can speed you up significantly if you are doing that correctly. Sometimes the game is annoying and demanding intelectually, but that's what it's all about
Nice thing is that you can play with ya friends ( if you wanna play, dont be that shy and feel free to add me ;] )
Ive paid 1,82$ for it so in my opinion, i think its really worth it if you like using your brain ;p

Best game I ever played (I have not yet played Half-Life)
Vavle, good job

Amazing game, a couple of small bugs here and there but i only came across one in my playthrough.
9.5/10 its worth the money
Portal 2  is fun best game eva
me mama ai, o que que tem, vai me dizer que tu nunca mamou ninguem, me mama ai, o que que tem, vai me dizer que tu nunca mamou ninguem.
its so fun! especially with a friend in co op
Love this game to bits! Though it has a liner progression, it never stops being fun or exciting.

Incredible Game! if you don't own it, you are missing out!

10/10
oh my god this is probably my favourite game to date its so much fun
What can I say? A masterpiece of a game with amazing graphics for it's age, and a perfect story to match. If you haven't played this game, you are missing out big time.
